attributes.action: Black Food Trays and Cartons that cannot be Recycled
attributes.additional_details:
Black food trays and cartons are often used by Manufacturers to contain food that is cooked in an oven, yet these cannot be Recycled and they make a large contribution to unnecessary waste and environmental pollution.

The Government should introduce a Law that states only Recyclable food trays and cartons can be legally sold in the UK.
